content.title: Homocystinuria Vascular Manifestations
content.description: Inherited metabolic disorder with elevated homocysteine leading to premature atherosclerosis and thrombosis.

pathophysiology.mechanism: Elevated homocysteine causes endothelial dysfunction, platelet activation

treatment.medical: Vitamin B6, folate, B12; betaine for non-responders

surgical_considerations.management: Optimize homocysteine levels preoperatively, perioperative anticoagulation

content.clinical_pearl: Unlike Marfan (upward lens dislocation), homocystinuria has downward dislocation; check homocysteine in young thrombosis
